alert.note: Alert for Douglas; Webster; Wright (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 08 at 9:57AM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM CST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southwest Missouri, including the following counties, Douglas, Webster and Wright. * WHEN...Until 400 PM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Some low-water crossings may become impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 955 AM CST, The Department of Transportation reported flooding on Wolf Creek at the Highway AB low water crossing due to runoff from previous moderate to heavy rain in the advisory area in the past 24 hours. Between 1 and 1.5 inches of rain have fallen. - This includes the following low water crossings... Finley River at Highway Z, Wolf Creek at Highway AB, Baker Creek at Baker Creek Road and Finley River at Harmony Road. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Seymour, Mansfield, Fordland and Diggins. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles.
